asgiref.timeout

Classes

timeout

timeout context manager.

Module Contents

class asgiref.timeout.timeout(timeout: float | None, *, loop: asyncio.AbstractEventLoop | None = None)[source]

timeout context manager.

Useful in cases when you want to apply timeout logic around block of code or in cases when asyncio.wait_for is not suitable. For example:

>>> with timeout(0.001):
...     async with aiohttp.get('https://github.com') as r:
...         await r.text()

timeout - value in seconds or None to disable timeout logic loop - asyncio compatible event loop

property expired: bool[source]
property remaining: float | None[source]
